html:
{{ doc.company }}
{{ doc.select_print_heading or _("Invoice") }}

{{ _("Receipt No") }}: {{ doc.name }}
{{ _("Date") }}: {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_date") }}
{{ _("Customer") }}: {{ doc.customer_name }}

{%- for item in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
{{ _("Item") }} {{ _("Qty") }} {{ _("Amount") }}
{{ item.item_code }} {%- if item.item_name != item.item_code -%}
{{ item.item_name }}{%- endif -%} 		{{ item.qty }}
@ {{ item.get_formatted("rate") }}		 {{ item.get_formatted("amount") }}
{% if doc.flags.show_inclusive_tax_in_print %} {% else %} {% endif %} {%- for row in doc.taxes -%} {%- if not row.included_in_print_rate or doc.flags.show_inclusive_tax_in_print -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.discount_amount -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.rounded_total -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.change_amount -%} {%- endif -%}
{{ _("Total Excl. Tax") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("net_total", doc) }} {{ _("Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("total", doc) }}
{{ row.description }} {{ row.get_formatted("tax_amount", doc) }}
{{ _("Discount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("discount_amount") }}
{{ _("Grand Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total") }}
{{ _("Rounded Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("rounded_total") }}
{{ _("Paid Amount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("paid_amount") }}
{{ _("Change Amount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("change_amount") }}

{{ doc.terms or "" }}

{{ _("Thank you, please visit again.") }}

html:
{{ doc.company }}
{% if doc.company_address_display %} {% set company_address = doc.company_address_display.replace("\n", " ").replace("
", " ") %} {% if "GSTIN" not in company_address %} {{ company_address }} {{ _("GSTIN") }}:{{ doc.company_gstin }} {% else %} {{ company_address.replace("GSTIN", "
GSTIN") }} {% endif %} {% endif %}
{{ doc.select_print_heading or _("Invoice") }}

{{ _("Receipt No") }}: {{ doc.name }}
{{ _("Date") }}: {{ doc.get_formatted("posting_date") }}
{% if doc.grand_total > 50000 %} {% set customer_address = doc.address_display.replace("\n", " ").replace("
", " ") %} {{ _("Customer") }}:
{{ doc.customer_name }}
{{ customer_address }} {% endif %}

{%- for item in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}
{{ _("Item") }} {{ _("Qty") }} {{ _("Amount") }}
{{ item.item_code }} {%- if item.item_name != item.item_code -%}
{{ item.item_name }} {%- endif -%} {%- if item.gst_hsn_code -%}
{{ _("HSN/SAC") }}: {{ item.gst_hsn_code }} {%- endif -%} {%- if item.serial_no -%}
{{ _("Serial No") }}: {{ item.serial_no }} {%- endif -%} 		{{ item.qty }}
@ {{ item.rate }}		 {{ item.get_formatted("amount") }}
{% if doc.flags.show_inclusive_tax_in_print %} {% else %} {% endif %} {%- for row in doc.taxes -%} {%- if not row.included_in_print_rate or doc.flags.show_inclusive_tax_in_print -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.discount_amount -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.rounded_total -%} {%- endif -%} {%- if doc.change_amount -%} {%- endif -%}
{{ _("Total Excl. Tax") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("net_total", doc) }} {{ _("Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("total", doc) }}
{{ row.description }} {{ row.get_formatted("tax_amount", doc) }}
{{ _("Discount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("discount_amount") }}
{{ _("Grand Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("grand_total") }}
{{ _("Rounded Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("rounded_total") }}
{{ _("Paid Amount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("paid_amount") }}
{{ _("Change Amount") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("change_amount") }}

Tax Breakup:

{{ doc.other_charges_calculation }}

{{ doc.terms or "" }}

{{ _("Thank you, please visit again.") }}

name: Pickup Vehicle
Sales Invoice

html:
Vehicle Owner Release Form



EAZYAUTOTRADE, the legal and rightful owner of the below listed vehicle presently stored on the property owned and operated by North Bay Tow, Inc., and thus authorize the personnel of said company to release said vehicle to the following person(s) and/or insurance company, and/or agent thereof:


NAME: (authorized person)____________________________________


MOTOR VEHICLE INFORMATION:


MAKE          {{doc.make or ""}}      
MODEL ______{{doc.model or ""}}______
COLOR ______{{doc.exterior_color or ""}}______
YEAR    ______{{doc.year or ""}}______

VIN NO  ______{{doc.vim_number or ""}}______

Furthermore, I understand that in the event that the aforementioned vehicle is to be released to an individual person, that person will be required to present a "valid" photo identification card.

 

I am also aware that in the event that the said motor vehicle is in a "drivable" condition, a person with a "valid" driver’s license, will be the only individual allowed to remove said motor vehicle off of any and all vehicle storage properties.














_______________________________________

Authorized person's signature

___{{frappe.utils.nowdate().split("-")[0]}}___ /___{{frappe.utils.nowdate().split("-")[1]}}___ /___{{frappe.utils.nowdate().split("-")[2]}}___
DATE
name: Pick up Form

Booking # Seal # Container # Date To

{%endif%} {% if doc.consignee %}

Address: {{ frappe.db.get_value( "Container Party", doc.consignee, "address" ) or "-" }}
Telephone: {{ frappe.db.get_value( "Container Party", doc.consignee, "telephone" ) or "-" }}

{% endif %} {% for item in doc.item_description %} {% endfor %}

name: Container Detail

format_data:
[{"fieldname": "print_heading_template", "fieldtype": "Custom HTML", "options": "

{% set tps = frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "tps") %} {% set tvq = frappe.db.get_value("Company", doc.company, "tvq") %}

{% if tps %} TPS: {{ tps }} {% endif %}
{% if tvq %} TVQ: {{ tvq }} {% endif %}

By the seller YES NO {{frappe.db.get_value("Item", doc.items[0].item_code, "make")}} {{frappe.db.get_value("Item", doc.items[0].item_code, "model")}} {{frappe.db.get_value("Item", doc.items[0].item_code, "year")}} {{frappe.db.get_value("Item", doc.items[0].item_code, "exterior_color")}}
Days or Months Km: Serial Number Stock # Engine
{{frappe.db.get_value("Item", doc.items[0].item_code, "vim_number")}} 5 {{frappe.db.get_value("Item", doc.items[0].item_code, "engine_size")}}
By a third party YES NO Odo. Shown Odo. Real Net MAss
ACCOMODATION SALE PRICING INFORMATION

The undersigned person, who is the previous owner of the

vehicle sold herein, attests that this vehicle is sold to the

consumer he himself has designated.

 A - Vehicle price {{doc.items[0].gprice}}

B2 - Misc. Discounts {{doc.discount_amount}}
Signature: C - Sub-total : A B1 - B2 {{doc.items[0].gprice}}
D - Exchange vehicle
EXCHANGE VEHICLE E - Sub-total : C - D {{doc.items[0].gprice}}

The buyer hereby agrees to purchase from the buyer his vehicle

described below at the price and under the conditions mentioned

in this contract.

 F - GST 5% x E {% for tax in doc.taxes%} {% if tax.account_head == "GST receivable - 5% - EZ" %} {{tax.g_tax}} {%endif%} {%endfor%}
G - PST 9.975% x E {% for tax in doc.taxes%} {% if tax.account_head == "PST/QST receivable - 9.975% - EZ" %} {{tax.g_tax}} {%endif%} {%endfor%}
J - Total: E F G {{frappe.format_value(doc.total_g + doc.total_g_taxes_and_charges, {"docfield":"Currency"})}}
MAKE MODEL YEAR COLOR K - Accessories and others :
Serial Number Stock # Engine
Additional warranty:

The Purchaser agrees to give the Vendor as partial payment and

as a deposit the vehicle described above as the "trade-in vehicle."

The Purchaser declares that the vehicle is conform to its description

that it is not subject to any tariff pursuant to the Customs Act and

that it has no defect, hidden or apparent, except those described in

the evaluation report and in the written declaration attached here to

if such is the case. The Purchaser declares being the sole and

absolute owner of the trade-in vehicle which is not subject to any

restrictions in regards to its registration, and that it is free of any lien,

charge, rightof retention or other priority, as well as any other right,

except for declared provisions.

Creditor :
T - Total amount to pay of J O P1 P2 Q1 Q2 R S {{doc.get_formatted('grand_g_total')}}

BUYER INITIALS DATE X - Amount due at delivery T - U - V {{doc.get_formatted('grand_g_total')}}
